title: TIP21 - Tokenlon new assets listing VI ( Tokenlon 第六批新资产支持)
body:
#### Background
- Tokenlon protocol currently adopts a whitelist approach for listing new assets. The core team collects potential assets from the community and checks liquidity before the listing.
- For the assets meet the liquidity requirement, the core team will create a governance proposal and the community can now vote on the proposal to decide on the new asset listing.

#### Proposed new assets to support
| Token     | Contract Address | 
| :---        |    :----  | 
|AMP|0xff20817765cb7f73d4bde2e66e067e58d11095c2|
|AXS|0xbb0e17ef65f82ab018d8edd776e8dd940327b28b|
|BOND|0x0391d2021f89dc339f60fff84546ea23e337750f|
|CEL|0xaaaebe6fe48e54f431b0c390cfaf0b017d09d42d|
|DYDX|0x92d6c1e31e14520e676a687f0a93788b716beff5|
|ERN|0xbbc2ae13b23d715c30720f079fcd9b4a74093505|
|FLOAT|0xb05097849bca421a3f51b249ba6cca4af4b97cb9|
|FODL|0x4c2e59d098df7b6cbae0848d66de2f8a4889b9c3|
|GNO|0x6810e776880c02933d47db1b9fc05908e5386b96|
|INJ|0xe28b3b32b6c345a34ff64674606124dd5aceca30|
|LIT|0xb59490ab09a0f526cc7305822ac65f2ab12f9723|
|LPT|0x58b6a8a3302369daec383334672404ee733ab239|
|MASK|0x69af81e73a73b40adf4f3d4223cd9b1ece623074|
|MVI|0x72e364f2abdc788b7e918bc238b21f109cd634d7|
|NU|0x4fe83213d56308330ec302a8bd641f1d0113a4cc|
|OHM|0x383518188c0c6d7730d91b2c03a03c837814a899|
|POLS|0x83e6f1e41cdd28eaceb20cb649155049fac3d5aa|
|QNT|0x4a220e6096b25eadb88358cb44068a3248254675|
|SLP|0xcc8fa225d80b9c7d42f96e9570156c65d6caaa25|
|SPELL|0x090185f2135308bad17527004364ebcc2d37e5f6|
|TOKE|0x2e9d63788249371f1dfc918a52f8d799f4a38c94|
|TRIBE|0xc7283b66eb1eb5fb86327f08e1b5816b0720212b|

#### Goal
Let the community decide on the new asset listing

#### Proposed Action Items
Implement after the voting result is out, the exact time will depend on the preparation

#### Voting Rules
- Addresses with more than 0 LON or xLON can vote
- Addresses participating LON liquidity mining or holding the respective LP tokens can vote (including unclaimed LON reward)
- LON balance snapshot block: 13536476
- Voting start time: 2021.11.2 8:00 am UTC
- Voting end time: 2021.11.4 8:00 am UTC

#### Voting Options
- A. For, list these new assets
- B. Against, don't list these new assets

---
#### 背景
- Tokenlon 协议目前采用白名单上币方式，由核心团队从社区收集候选资产并检查流动性后执行上币。
- 通过流动性要求的新资产，将由核心团队发起治理提案，由社区投票决定是否支持。

#### 本期提议新增支持资产
| 代币名称    | 合约地址 | 
| :---        |    :----  | 
|AMP|0xff20817765cb7f73d4bde2e66e067e58d11095c2|
|AXS|0xbb0e17ef65f82ab018d8edd776e8dd940327b28b|
|BOND|0x0391d2021f89dc339f60fff84546ea23e337750f|
|CEL|0xaaaebe6fe48e54f431b0c390cfaf0b017d09d42d|
|DYDX|0x92d6c1e31e14520e676a687f0a93788b716beff5|
|ERN|0xbbc2ae13b23d715c30720f079fcd9b4a74093505|
|FLOAT|0xb05097849bca421a3f51b249ba6cca4af4b97cb9|
|FODL|0x4c2e59d098df7b6cbae0848d66de2f8a4889b9c3|
|GNO|0x6810e776880c02933d47db1b9fc05908e5386b96|
|INJ|0xe28b3b32b6c345a34ff64674606124dd5aceca30|
|LIT|0xb59490ab09a0f526cc7305822ac65f2ab12f9723|
|LPT|0x58b6a8a3302369daec383334672404ee733ab239|
|MASK|0x69af81e73a73b40adf4f3d4223cd9b1ece623074|
|MVI|0x72e364f2abdc788b7e918bc238b21f109cd634d7|
|NU|0x4fe83213d56308330ec302a8bd641f1d0113a4cc|
|OHM|0x383518188c0c6d7730d91b2c03a03c837814a899|
|POLS|0x83e6f1e41cdd28eaceb20cb649155049fac3d5aa|
|QNT|0x4a220e6096b25eadb88358cb44068a3248254675|
|SLP|0xcc8fa225d80b9c7d42f96e9570156c65d6caaa25|
|SPELL|0x090185f2135308bad17527004364ebcc2d37e5f6|
|TOKE|0x2e9d63788249371f1dfc918a52f8d799f4a38c94|
|TRIBE|0xc7283b66eb1eb5fb86327f08e1b5816b0720212b|
AMP、FLOAT、POLS 等代币，因报价问题延迟至第六批上线

#### 目的
由社区投票决定新资产支持

#### 提案执行项
根据提案投票结果尽快实施，生效时间根据实际准备情况决定

#### 投票规则
- 持有 LON 或 xLON 大于 0 的地址能够参与本次治理投票
- 参与 LON 流动性挖矿或持有对应 LP 代币的地址能够参与本次治理投票（包含未领取 LON 奖励）
- LON 持有量快照区块高度：13536476
- 治理投票开启时间：2021.11.2 16:00 UTC+8
- 治理投票结束时间：2021.11.4 16:00 UTC+8

#### 投票选项
- A. 支持，上线以上币种
- B. 反对，不上线以上币种
